caption:
This photograph captures a serene underwater scene in a murky, blue-green aquatic environment. In the foreground, two divers are visible engaging in underwater activities. The central figure, a man, is swimming upside down with his legs slightly bent and arms outstretched, holding a flipper in his right hand. He wears a red and white swimsuit. Above him, another diver equipped with fins and a snorkel can be seen, partly out of frame. 

The environment around them features various elements of marine life, including tall, dark coral formations in the foreground that rise towards the water's surface, creating a sense of depth and texture. There are also rocky formations and perhaps other types of aquatic plants. 

Light permeates the water from the surface, creating a dappled effect on the scene below, with beams of light illuminating parts of the coral and the swimmers. This lighting adds a calming, almost ethereal quality to the overall ambiance of the underwater landscape.

Overall, the composition and the activities suggest a moment of exploration or leisure in a rich, aquatic ecosystem, with an emphasis on the interaction between humans and the natural underwater world.
title: Snorkeler observes the coral and sea life at the John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park near Key Largo. Water clarity has noticeably decreased in recent years because of dredging and landfill operations by developers.
